message:
Dear {{ user }},

We would like to inform you that the following Weekoff Change Request has been Deleted successfully from the system:

{% for row in doc.weekoff_details %} {% endfor %}
Employee {{ doc.employee_name }}
Weekoff Date Changes
Existing Weekoff Date New Weekoff Date
{{ frappe.utils.format_date(row.existing_weekoff_date, "dd-MM-yyyy") if row.existing_weekoff_date else "" }} {{ frappe.utils.format_date(row.new_weekoff_date, "dd-MM-yyyy") if row.new_weekoff_date else "" }}

If you have any questions or need further assistance, please contact the HR Manager.

Regards,
HR Management System
name: WeekOff Change Request Deleted Notification
subject: WeekOff Change Request Deleted : {{docname}}
